headline: Trump endorsement helps far more than Bidens
author: Paul Bedard
sentences:
His endorsed candidates are undefeated in 2022 primaries, and campaigns continue to build their messaging around President Trump and his endorsement.?
Oz, for example, just released an ad built around the former presidents endorsement, and candidates have been lining up at Trumps Florida Mar-a-Lago resort for an audience to seek his backing.

Not only does the desire for a Trump endorsement show that the former president remains the de facto leader of the party, but in spreading around big election winners, Trump is building a whole new base for his likely 2024 try to win back the White House, associates said.

According to the latest Rasmussen Reports survey, 59% of GOP voters said they would be more likely? to vote for? a candidate endorsed by Trump, the biggest indication yet of the importance of a Trump blue check, especially in primaries.

By comparison, just 47% of Democrats would be more likely to vote for a Biden-backed candidate, fewer than the 49% of Democrats who said they would be less likely or that his endorsement wouldnt make a difference.

Trump's Endorsement More Valuable Than Bidens
More than a year after he left office, Donald Trumps endorsement of candidates still matters  more even than the current occupant of the White House.

pic.twitter.com/AcHxgnHFa7
 Rasmussen Reports (@Rasmussen_Poll) May 3, 2022
When Democrats and Republicans are combined, the overall endorsement value for both Trump and Biden is below 50%.
Democrats have a mixed reaction to the value of a candidate endorsement from President Joe Biden, but thats not the case for Republicans when former President Donald Trump weighs in.
For Biden, 26% of voters said they would be more likely to vote for his candidate, 46% said they'd be less likely, and 26% said it wouldn't make a difference.
For Trump, 32% said they would be more likely to choose his pick, 43% said they'd be less likely, and 23% said it wouldn't make much difference.
A combined 39% of Republicans said Trumps backing would either make no difference or make them less likely to choose his pick.
Trumps former White House political director, Brian Jack, told Secrets that Trumps endorsement is gold in elections.
Trump has made other unconventional endorsements, such as his pick of TVs Dr. Mehmet Oz in Pennsylvania.
Trump, unlike Biden, has been front and center in the endorsement business since he left office.
In tonights primaries, he has 22 endorsements on the line, including Ohio Senate candidate J.D.
President Trumps endorsement is the most powerful endorsement in politics,? Jack said.
Vance, author of Hillbilly Elegy, who is now narrowly considered the front-runner.
Coming Up Today:@JoeBiden daily presidential job approval % is - down.
In the 2022 primaries so far, his record is 33 wins and zero losses.
And he has a very successful record.
